channel.title: RichScape Starting Place and Death Place
channel.description:
How do i change it so that when you log on you will automatically start in edgeville bank. I know its in Player.java but i don't know where.
Also, how do i make it so when you die you also pop up in edgville bank? I'm assuming its also in Player.java but again, I'm not sure where.
Thanks for the help ;)
